metadata.title: Design System | Walter Morales
metadata.description: Design system and UI guidelines for the portfolio website.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: This design system establishes the foundation for building consistent, accessible, and maintainable UI components. It defines typography scales, color palettes, spacing systems, and component patterns used throughout the site.

typography.title: Typography
typography.description: Consistent typography creates hierarchy and improves readability.

scale.title: Typography Scale
scale.description: Use these canonical classes instead of arbitrary pixel values.

bodyText.name: Body Text
bodyText.description: Default body text, summaries, and descriptions. Replaces text-[13px].
bodyText.example: This is body text used for summaries, descriptions, and general content. It provides good readability while maintaining a clean, minimal aesthetic.

metaText.name: Meta Text
metaText.description: Dates, tags, labels, and small metadata. Replaces text-[11px].

smallHeading.name: Small Heading
smallHeading.description: Small headings, card titles, and list item titles. Replaces text-[15px].

maintainConsistency.title: Maintain consistency:
maintainConsistency.description: Use the same typography classes for the same semantic purpose across all pages.

dontMix.title: Don't mix patterns:
dontMix.description: Avoid using different font sizes for the same semantic role in different components.

colors.title: Colors
colors.description: Semantic color tokens for consistent theming.

palette.title: Color Palette
palette.description: Use semantic color names, not raw color values.

accent.name: Accent
accent.description: Primary actions, links, highlights, and interactive elements.

foreground.name: Foreground
foreground.description: Primary text color, headings, and high-contrast elements.

muted.name: Muted
muted.description: Backgrounds for cards, code blocks, and subtle UI elements.

mutedForeground.name: Muted Foreground
mutedForeground.description: Secondary text, descriptions, and less prominent content.

spacing.title: Spacing
spacing.description: Consistent spacing creates visual rhythm and hierarchy.

scale.title: Spacing Scale
scale.description: Use Tailwind's spacing scale for consistent gaps and padding.

do.title: Do
do.description: Use consistent spacing tokens like space-y-4, gap-6, and p-8.

dont.title: Don't
dont.description: Avoid arbitrary spacing values like gap-[13px] or p-[17px].

components.title: Components
components.description: Reusable UI components built with shadcn/ui and Tailwind CSS.

button.title: Button
button.description: Use Button component for all interactive actions.

badge.title: Badge
badge.description: Use Badge for tags, labels, and status indicators.

slides.title: Slides
slides.description: Presentation slide primitives for the JSON-driven slides engine. These components are designed for readability at presentation distance and PDF export.

frame.title: Slide Frame
frame.description: The 16:9 aspect ratio canvas wrapper for slides. Uses CSS aspect-ratio for responsive sizing in preview, and fixed dimensions for PDF export.

typography.title: Slide Typography
typography.description: Typography scale optimized for presentation slides.
typography.headline: Headline (4xl-6xl)

list.title: Slide List
list.description: Bullet points and numbered lists. Max 5 items recommended for readability.

breakdown.title: Slide Breakdown
breakdown.description: Percentage/value breakdowns rendered as horizontal bars or stat cards. Pure CSS for PDF compatibility.

cardGrid.title: Card Grid
cardGrid.description: Grid of content cards. 2 cards = 50/50, 3 cards = 33/33/33, 4+ cards = 2x2 grid.

timeline.title: Timeline
timeline.description: Sequential events or milestones. Max 4 events recommended. Supports horizontal and vertical layouts.
